doc.after: Rwanda has been governed by a strict hierarchy since precolonial times 102 Before colonisation the King Mwami exercised control through a system of provinces districts hills and neighbourhoods 103 The current constitution divides Rwanda into provinces intara districts uturere cities municipalities towns sectors imirenge cells utugari and villages imidugudu the larger divisions and their borders are established by Parliament 104
